paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2 gene mutations c.3482dup and c.8878 C>T have been linked to an increased risk of BC in southern Brazil.

functional_data.summary: BRCA2 mutations are associated with increased breast cancer risk.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is specifically noted in the context of increased breast cancer risk.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 gene mutations c.3482dup and c.8878 C>T have been linked to an increased risk of BC in southern Brazil.
